items.title: O'Neil replaces Rosenior as new Strasbourg boss
items.summary: Strasbourg have confirmed the appointment of Gary O'Neill as their new head coach following the departure of Liam Rosenior to Chelsea.

items.title: VI Live: Lamine Yamal op de bank, Pep stelt teruggehaalde verdediger meteen op
items.summary: Woensdagavond staan er weer veel mooie potjes op het programma. Er zijn liefst acht duels in de Premier League, er wordt gevoetbald in de Serie A en Barcelona speelt de halve finale van de Spaanse Supercopa tegen Athletic Bilbao. Volg de duels in de VI Live.

items.title: Clubloze Falcao (39) gaat na halfjaar t√≥ch door bij Colombiaanse jeugdliefde
items.summary: Radamel Falcao heeft voor verbazing gezorgd in Colombia. De 39-jarige spits heeft woensdag een contract voor de rest van het seizoen getekend bij Millonarios, de club waar hij afgelopen zomer nog besloot om niet te verlengen. Nu de voormalig Colombiaanse stervoetballer een halfjaar zonder club zat, is hij teruggekomen op zijn eerdere besluit. 'Een last-dance .'

items.title: Former England boss Keegan diagnosed with cancer
items.summary: Former England striker and manager Kevin Keegan has been diagnosed with cancer and is receiving treatment.

items.title: Dit is het schema van de kwartfinale van de Afrika Cup
items.summary: De achtste finales van de Afrika Cup zitten erop, wat betekent dat het tijd is voor de kwartfinales. Na twee rustdagen gaat het toernooi vrijdag verder. We zetten de wedstrijden op een rij.

items.title: Roma chief: Amorim axe has changed Zirkzee plan
items.summary: Roma sporting director Ricky Massara has hinted that a planned move for Joshua Zirkzee may be on the backburner following Ruben Amorim's Manchester United sacking.

items.title: Bij Feyenoord kunnen ze alleen nog maar hopen
items.summary: Op een paar uitzonderingen na die juist net in een flow waren geraakt, haalden de Eredivisie-clubs op het tandvlees de winterstop. Veel tijd om weer op adem te komen, hebben ze alleen niet, want dit weekeinde begint het hele circus alweer. In aanloop naar het cruciale deel van het seizoen maken we bij elke club de balans op, waarbij we wat de volgorde betreft uitgaan van de eerste speelronde van 2026. Deze keer: Feyenoord.

De Braziliaanse aanvaller worstelt met zijn vorm en weigert vooralsnog een nieuw contract bij de Spaanse topclub te tekenen. Bellingham denkt √©√©n van de mogelijke oorzaken te weten.

items.title: West Ham fan turnout against Nottingham Forest almost half official attendance
items.summary: Real attendance closer to 34,000 than 62,429 announced Marketing push fails to attract fans to watch ailing club West Ham‚Äôs official attendance of 62,429 for their 2-1 defeat by Nottingham Forest was almost twice as high as the number of fans who went through the turnstiles at the London Stadium on Tuesday night. The club have an increasingly apathetic fanbase and were unable to convince a big crowd to turn out for a crucial clash in the battle against relegation from the Premier League. It is understood the real attendance was closer to 34,000 than the figure given by West Ham on their website. Continue reading...

items.title: Ex-Tottenham and England forward Chivers dies aged 80
items.summary: Former Tottenham and England forward Martin Chivers dies at the age of 80.

items.title: Martin Chivers, former Tottenham and England striker, dies aged 80
items.summary: Chivers also had long spell with Southampton He scored 13 times in 24 games for England The former Tottenham, Southampton and England striker Martin Chivers has died at the age of 80. Chivers, a League Cup and Uefa Cup winner with Spurs, won 24 caps from 1971 to 1973, scoring 13 goals. ‚ÄúIt is with immense sadness that we announce the passing of our legendary former striker Martin Chivers,‚Äù Spurs said. ‚ÄúWe extend our deepest sympathies to Martin‚Äôs family, friends and former teammates at this incredibly sad time. Our players will wear black armbands during this evening‚Äôs fixture against AFC Bournemouth. Rest in peace, Martin. One of the all-time greats.‚Äù Continue reading...

items.title: Fifa will scan World Cup players to make offside avatars
items.summary: Fifa is to create AI-enabled 3D avatars of all players at the World Cup to enhance semi-automated offside technology.

items.title: Solskj√¶r would be a huge risk for Manchester United‚Äôs beleaguered hierarchy | Jamie Jackson
items.summary: There is no guarantee the Norwegian would restore a sense of positivity like he did first time round ‚Äì and failure would be a nightmare Ole Gunnar Solskj√¶r‚Äôs prime candidacy to become Manchester United‚Äôs interim manager for a second time appears the latest faulty strategic move by Jason Wilcox, the club‚Äôs director of football, and the chief executive, Omar Berrada. Solskj√¶r, whose previous tenure at United seems to place him ahead of another favoured candidate in Michael Carrick, has to be a success. If not, Sir Jim Ratcliffe will surely file his hiring alongside the Ruben Amorim, Dan Ashworth and Erik ten Hag fiascos, for which Wilcox‚ÄëBerrada are fully or partly responsible. Continue reading...

items.title: 'Time for change is now' - Hamilton makes birthday pledge
items.summary: Lewis Hamilton says "the time for change is now" after a "very draining year" as he sent a message to his fans on his 41st birthday.
